divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: It happened at 8:42 in Canton. I was just out in the yard having a smoke with a good friend whe we saw it. It flew from east to west really fast. I noticed it had a dark oval shape and was travelling probably beneath the clouds or maybe just amonmg the lower layers There were 4 lights and 2 were changing colors (very bright pinks and greens). It was larger than a jet and probably a bit more than twice as fast as one. As it sped of it made a LOOOOOOOOO noise.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Canton
There were no other sightings in Canton on or around March 20th 2005
